parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate by name, surname, or any other clear identifier.  It focuses on a public health issue (West Nile Virus).</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content addresses a public health concern affecting a large segment of the population in Romania. The reach estimate is ">1M".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to raise awareness about the West Nile Virus outbreak in Romania, providing information and urging preventive measures. There is no discernible attempt to influence voters' choices in the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents factual information about a public health crisis, citing sources (dr. Adrian Pană) and statistics.  It resembles a news report or public service announcement, aiming to inform the public rather than advocate for a specific political agenda.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions; it presents factual information and calls for public health action.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1278480036666831</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, focusing on the West Nile Virus outbreak in Romania, does not constitute electoral propaganda.  It lacks any reference to parliamentary candidates or parties, its objective is clearly public health awareness, and its style resembles journalistic reporting. The paid nature of the post on a public platform does not automatically qualify it as electoral propaganda if the content itself is unrelated to the election.  The post's information is factual and aims to inform and encourage preventive measures, not to influence voting behavior.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Videomedicina.ro</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
